Goodnight everyone.



::Perndabot::

"Zardus sent me here to make a standard alliance," Perndabot replies 
to Darkfate's last question, "You know, like we help you and you help 
us kind of things. I'd have to contact Zardus for anything more than 
that though."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> "That's sounds good" said the dragon and though "And that means 
> troubles, too"
> 
> "I'm interesting to speak about" said the dragon "Are you free to 
act 
> or have I to wait that your leader has time to speak about? "
